import {Meta} from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/ActivityFeedView"/>

# Default Activity Feed Factory

```jsx
const DefaultActivityFeedFactory = (props) => {

	const {_links} = props;

	const defaultSorting = [{column: "eventDate", direction: "DESC"}];

	return (
		<ActivityFeedView {...props} queryLink={_links.query} sorting={defaultSorting}/>
	);
};
```
